phrases: Well, Kosaki?
What do you think of our new fall offerings?
You might want to maximize the sweetness of the chestnuts more.
But really, what is the rush?
Summer's only just started, you know.
If we do not get a jump on it now, we will not be done in time.
Really, I just cannot figure it out.
Why is it that you cannot cook when you have the best taste buds of us all, Sister?
I wish I knew that myself.
Okay, I am off to let Dad know what you think.
Oh, by the way, Sister...
I know I am the one who asked you to be our taster,
but do not you think you have been putting on some pounds lately?
Better watch out, or you are going to get chubby in no time!
I-I am fine!
I am watching my weight!
Easy enough for me to say, but I do eat a lot of sweets these days.
And it is been a while since I last got on that scale.
I am not getting much exercise, either,
so I would better take better care of my body.
No way...
No way!
How did this happen after only a few days of not weighing myself?!
I admit I have a pretty good idea what the because is,
but how could I have gained this much so suddenly?
Outwardly, I do not look that much different.
But am I the only one who thinks that?
In other people's eyes, does this tummy look enormous?
After all, Haru did point that out just now.
This is terrible!
I have got to fix this right away!
I Want to Lose Weight
Hey, Ruri-chan?
Do you think I have gained weight lately?
You do not look any different than usual to me.
Well, yeah.
You might want to be a little careful about that.
I knew it!
I knew it, I have put on weight!
I know they say it is hard to notice the changes in your own body.
But I really had no clue!
What should I do?
I started off by skipping breakfast,
but to slim down, first, I need to exercise, right?
And also...
Morning!
Hey!
Morning, Onodera!
Good morning, Ichijo!
Th-That is right!
The last thing I want is for Ichijo to find out I have gained weight!
I have got to she would these pounds before he does!
All right, I am going to do this!
Starting today, no sweets whatsoever!
And I am going to go easy on meals, as much as I can.
GURRR!
Huh?
What was that?
W-Well, now, what was that sound, I wonder?
An earthquake?
You think it was an earthquake?
That is so scary!
Really, now!
Why did my stomach have to growl now?
Sure, I skipped breakfast today,
but there is no need to growl that loudly!
A-Are you all right, Onodera?
You kind of look pale.
What?
No, no...
It is nothing!
GURRR!
I-It is nothing, okay?
Honestly!
I-Is that right?
Y-You have got to hang in there, Kosaki!
You only have to suffer for now...
It is only for now!
Once you have lost those extra pounds, you can eat like you always did!
Hey!
Kosaki!
Hey, you remember about our date today, right?
Classes cannot end soon enough, huh?
Date?
What was that again?
You know, what we have all been talking about.
We are going to that all-you-can-eat cake place today.
Did we really say we were going to do that?!
Oh right, we talked about it
Now I remember!
It is that yummy-looking cake shop that was on TV the other day.
I want to go...
But I have already made up my mind about this.
S-Sorry...
The thing is, I have an emergency today.
I am really sorry!
What, really?
Too bad.
But it is just as well, you know, Young Mistress...
You went to have all-you-can-eat cake yesterday and the day before as well.
You are eating too much cake.
Hey, I just wanted to compare the shops.
Hey!
Kosaki!
What?
What?
What?
What?
It is the same with Ruri, too.
Where does all the food go, I wonder?
I do not understand it!
All this talk of cake is making me hungrier than ever.
But it is only second period now, so there is still a way to go before lunch.
But... but...
I do not want my stomach to start growling in the classroom again!
What are you doing, Onodera?
In a place like that...
I want to die, I wish I could just die.
A girl getting caught eating lunch early...
How am I supposed to talk to him?
Just as I thought, Onodera's acting a little weird today.
Wonder if she is under the weather.
Or maybe something is bugging her?
Huh?
Everyone is going somewhere...
What was our next class again?
Gym!
That is right, I have got to exercise, exercise!
I do not have time to sit around moping!
I have got to do whatever I can to lose weight today!
And so I have got to exercise!
I am going to exercise and forget how I messed up just now!
So the girls are swimming today, huh?
But I am hopeless in the water.
And besides, I would rather not get into an outfit that will expose my body.
No, no!
No whining, now!
They say that swimming's a good way to lose weight!
I have got to give it my all!
Hey, today you are pumped up, for once.
How about it?
Want to practice with me today?
I can go at your pace, all right?
Sure!
I am counting on you!
I never thought I would end up drowning.
I guess I was totally weak from not having eaten.
Well, I toughed it out for one day.
Wonder if anything changed?
Not that I think for a second that I have lost weight in a single day.
I-I have gained weight!
And so much, too!
No way!
But I have hardly eaten a thing today.
Why?!
Onodera, are you okay?
Huh?
What do you mean?
I am totally fine.
What is going on with her?
Is she feeling sick, after all?
And I heard she collapsed during gym yesterday.
Dammit, I wish I could help her somehow.
Come on!
Muster up some courage, Raku!
H-Hey, Onodera!
That konnyaku I boiled in soy sauce the other day... you remember that?
Yes, I remember.
So anyway, this time I asked Miyamoto what your favorites were beforehand,
and I made these.
Candied sweet potatoes.
Wh-Why did you have to do that now?!
My favorite food is right before my eyes!
What should I do?
I want to eat them!
They smell so amazing!
That is Ichijo for you...
One look and you can tell they are delicious!
Do not tell me he made them just for me?
No, no, I cannot!
I cannot!
I cannot!
I have already decided not to eat anything today!
And I gained even more weight yesterday!
But...
Ichijo did go to the trouble of making them for me.
One bite cannot hurt...
O-Onodera?
One bite cannot hurt!
Hey, listen...
You do not have to force yourself, you know.
S-Sorry, Ichijo.
Actually, see, I am not hungry right now.
I am so sorry I am not hungry!
Huh?
Hey!
It is so serious she cannot even gulp down her favorite food?
Is she really okay?
I wanted to eat them!
They were delicious for sure!
And Ichijo made them just for me!
I am such an idiot!
What am I doing, anyway?
I am just spinning my wheels again.
Because of my selfishness, I ended up hurting Ichijo.
How should I apologize to him?
I wonder if he will let me try them again?
H-How about some tea, Onodera?
My bad.
Guess I stuck my nose where it did not belong, huh?
But it seemed like you had not been eating much lately,
so I thought it would be easier if it were something you liked.
I-Is anything bothering you?
If you do not mind talking to me, I will be happy to listen.
Ichijo...
So he was worried about me.
I feel so bad about that.
When it is all my fault.
But... what am I going to do?
That makes me happy, after all.
Thank you for worrying about me.
But it is nothing serious.
You sure?
If that is the case, fine.
Oh, but you better make sure you at least eat right, okay?
You are thin, Onodera,
so you got to eat right or you will pass out.
What is up with that smirk on your face?
No, no...
It is nothing.
By the way, what is been bugging you?
No, no, the problem's been solved.
I hope you know that scale's busted.
You should have told me sooner!
I nearly had a heart attack!
Good Morning
My name is Kosaki Onodera.
When I was a third year in junior high,
I fell in love.
I fell in love with my classmate, Raku Ichijo.
It was not as if he was exceptionally good at schoolwork or sports,
but it was that simple, inner gentleness that I was so in love with.
When we were second years, we became classmates for the first time,
and as third years, we finally got to be speaking acquaintances.
But normally, we had no real contact.
And I hardly ever went out of my way to talk to him,
but saying good morning in the morning, and see you after class...
That was what I looked forward to everyday.
Otori Girls' High School
All right!
But...
Hey, Raku,
you have already narrowed it down to just one high school, right?
Yeah.
Bonyari High.
You are trying for Bonyari too?
Yeah, you cannot beat the short commute, huh?
Hey, let us hang out together again, okay?
I am going to be stuck with you again?
What is the problem?
You do not like it?
Needless to say...
Once we go on to high school, I will not be able to see Ichijo anymore.
Pretty soon, I will not be able to say good morning or see you...
That would be so sad.
I want to be with Ichijo longer.
I want to talk to him more, about so many things!
Ruri!
I am going to take the exam for Bonyari High School!
Did not you say you were going for Otori Girls' High?
Because there is tons of yummy cake shops around there?
Well... that is...
Yes, I did say that.
Now that you mention it, Ichijo says he is going to Bonyari High, too.
What is that look on your face?
Then maybe I will go to Bonyari, too!
But Ruri, I thought you said...
I know which college I want to go to,
but as far as high school goes, it does not really matter which I attend.
But I have to tell you,
even though Bonyari's not a selective school by any means,
it is still going to be hard for you.
Since your grades are pretty low.
I will work on that.
And so I started studying for the entrance exam.
National High School Entrance Exam Questionnaire Compilation - English
To go to the same school as the boy I loved.
An ulterior motive, yes,
but for someone who would never in her fifteen years had a clear dream or goal in mind,
there was no greater goal than that.
And I think I studied harder than I ever had before in my life.
Wake up!
And then...
Bonyari High School Entrance Exam Site
The day of the exam...
O-O-Onodera!
Wait, are you taking the exam for Bonyari, too?
Uh, yes, actually, I am.
I wish you would have told me...
Is that right... is that right?
Let us give it our best shot today, all right?
Let us both get in, no matter what!
Okay!
For some reason, I had the burning conviction that I would pass.
Huh?
I thought you would be way more freaked out.
Oh, this is nothing!
It is all right...
After all, I studied so hard!
And Ruri helped me out so much.
Now all I have to do is give it my best shot.
I am going to pass for sure, just like him!
I failed.
In the end, all that work was for nothing.
I can never say good morning to him again.
And he will never say see you to me again...
How did it go, Kosaki?
Hey!
Where are you going, Kosaki?
Hey, come back here!
Why, you...
Hey!
Mom, this looks bad!
Sister's turned into graffiti!
I can never look Ruri or Ichijo in the eye again.
This is so sad...
If I would known this was going to happen,
I wish I would just told him how I felt...
Onodera?
What are you doing in a place like this?
Ichijo...
Wh-What about you, Ichijo?
What are you doing here?
I was getting ready for tomorrow's orientation, see.
My heart's flipping and flopping, even at a time like this!
I must be the biggest idiot on Earth!
I heard about the results.
And Ichijo did not go into it any further.
He really is kind-hearted, Ichijo...
If only I could go to the same school as him, I would be so...
But anyway, are not you cold, dressed like that?
Do you want to use my scarf?
Huh?
N-N-No, that is okay.
It is all right, use it.
Just seeing you like that is making me feel chilly.
That is okay.
You are going to catch a cold, Ichijo!
I will be fine, so just use it!
I am all right... really!
Okay, then, I will use it, too.
You would be okay with that, right?
Now we kind of seem like boyfriend and girlfriend.
It is pretty long, huh?
This scarf...
Someone at the house has been knitting up a storm lately.
We have got like a huge surplus.
What?
This is hand-knitted?
What am I going to do?
I feel so happy, but could this be my chance to confess my feelings?
But I could never...
Hey, Onodera...
Hey!
Sorry!
It is my mom calling!
It is all right!
It is all right!
Go on, answer it!
Hello?
I passed?
I got admitted from Bonyari's wait list!
We just got the letter!
F-For real?!
All right!
Awesome!
Good for you!
Yahoo!
He was so happy for me.
As happy as if it were himself.
He almost seemed a bit too happy.
He really is a great person!
All right, so that means we can go to tomorrow's orientation together, right?
Right!
See you, Onodera!
Yes!
See you, Ichijo!
Since that day,
I think Ichijo and I have been having slightly more substantial conversations.
Even so,
even though we are both second years now,
my love has yet to be fulfilled,
but the unchanging bliss of my days also goes on...
Hey, Onodera!
Good morning...
Ichijo!
